name: Js-Invaders
tagline: A minimal implementation of the classic 'Space Invaders' game
body:
Can you survive the alien invasion?

## How To Play
* Fire shots at the invaders with the space bar
* Avoid invader shots with the left and right arrow keys
* Clear all invaders from the level to survive and advance


### Authors and Contributors

Phi.Sanders (@sci-phi) based on a presntation by Mary Rose Cook (@maryrosecook)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
